name: Tomato Soup
short_description: A comforting and flavorful tomato soup, perfect for a cozy meal.
long_description: Tomato Soup is a classic comfort dish with a rich and savory flavor. This homemade recipe combines tomatoes, onions, and aromatic herbs for a delicious and heartwarming soup.
ingredients: 1/2 cup Heavy cream (optional, for a creamier soup)
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and saut√© until translucent.
Add minced garlic and cook for an additional minute.
Pour in canned tomatoes and break them apart using a spoon.
Add vegetable or chicken broth, sugar, dried basil, salt, and pepper.
Bring the soup to a simmer and let it cook for 15-20 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
If you prefer a creamy soup, stir in the heavy cream.
Use an immersion blender to blend the soup until smooth. Alternatively, transfer to a blender in batches.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve hot with croutons if desired.
